attributes.action: Create better sports venues for events in Lincoln!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lincoln is one of the rapidly growing cities on the map, and with no exception is a massively improving 'sport city'. In athletics, there are very little facilities able to hold events at UK standard. With the London 2012 Olympics in mind, This petition is aimed at investing money into improving the venues in Lincoln, and making them available for competition.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
